title: SALTIEST PLAYERS EVER!!! Now I've got your attn here's Friendly Foes wholesome SC2 :)
excerpt: *NEW SHOW?* Friendly Foes: What's the opposite of Salt Mines? Wholesome/friendly banter :D.
